original_text: You will have a happy life that is brighter than the sun at noon. Even if trouble makes it dark, it will still seem like a bright morning. You will have a happy life
korean_text: 네 생명의 날이 대낮보다 밝으리니 어둠이 있다 할지라도 아침과 같이 될 것이요

sentences.original_text: You will have a happy life
that is brighter than the sun at noon
Even if trouble makes it dark
it will still seem like a bright morning
sentences.korean_translation: 그것은 여전히 밝은 아침처럼 보일 것이다

sentences.original_text: You will have a happy life
